mapper.select: SELECT b.orders_no ordersNo, b.board_content boardContent, b.create_date createDate, g.goods_no goodsNo , g.goods_title goodsTitle, c.customer_email customerEmail FROM board b INNER JOIN orders o ON b.orders_no = o.orders_no INNER JOIN payment p ON o.payment_no = p.payment_no INNER JOIN address a ON p.address_no = a.address_no INNER JOIN customer c ON a.customer_email = c.customer_email INNER JOIN goods g ON o.goods_no = g.goods_no ORDER BY b.orders_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage};
